original: unfold filterdiff. intros [Hlin Hdiff]. split. - apply (is_linear_ext_l (fun u => opp (lf u))). + auto. + intros u. apply opp_opp. - intros x Hx. specialize (Hdiff x Hx). unfold is_domin. intros e He. specialize (Hdiff e He). destruct Hdiff as [d Hd]. exists d. intros y Hy. unfold minus in *. rewrite <- opp_plus. apply Hd. auto.
